product_results.title: Restored Apple iPhone SE (3rd Generation) - Fully Unlocked - 64 GB Product (Red) (Refurbished)
product_results.short_description: Restored Serious power meets serious value with the iPhone SE in Black from SIMPLE Mobile. A lightning-fast A15 Bionic chip and fast 5G(1) connectivity make this the most powerful 4.7-inch(2) iPhone ever. Enjoy up to 15 hours(3) of video playback on a Retina HD display made from the toughest glass available in a smartphone. Go big with stellar battery life and a superstar camera system featuring a 12MP Wide camera, Smart HDR 4, Photographic Styles, Portrait mode, and 4K video up to 60 fps. Share the moment with friends and family in stunning detail on the 7MP FaceTime HD camera with 1080p video recording. This iPhone is built for life-on-the-go with a durable, IP67 water resistant(4) design and a Home button with secure Touch ID. You’ll love the power and the possibilities of iOS 15, which packs new features to do more with iPhone than ever before(5). Pair it with an unlimited talk, text & data plan with coverage on a powerful nationwide 5G network without a contract from SIMPLE Mobile to keep you connected for less. Legal Disclaimers (1) Data plan required. 5G is available in select markets and through select carriers. Speeds vary based on site conditions and carrier. For details on 5G support, contact your carrier and see apple/iphone/cellular. (2) Display size is measured diagonally. (3) Battery life varies by use and configuration. See apple website for more information. (4) iPhone SE (3rd generation) has a rating of IP67 under IEC standard 60529 (maximum depth of 1 meter up to 30 minutes) [Refurbished]
product_results.detailed_description_html:
• “Like-new” condition with very light micro-scratches, invisible at a distance of 8-12 inches (arm’s length).
  • Battery life, if applicable, must be 80% of the “like-new” equivalent or higher. At least 90-days free returns.
  • This 3rd Generation  iPhone SE 3 - 2022 is Factory Unlocked and is Compatible with any service provider in the world including ATT, Tmobile, Verizon, Boost, Xfinity, Straight Talk and all others
  • Brand New. With 5G, iPhone SE gives users faster downloads and uploads, higher quality video streaming, real-time interactivity in apps, and much more.
  • iPhone SE features an all-new camera system powered by A15 Bionic, with a 12-megapixel ƒ/1.8 aperture Wide camera that offers incredible computational photography benefits, including Smart HDR 4, Photographic Styles, Deep Fusion, and Portrait mode.
  • iPhone SE features the familiar Home button with Touch ID — an easy, private, and secure alternative for logging in to apps, authorizing App Store purchases, making Apple Pay transactions, and more.<

specifications.name: Assembled Product Dimensions (L x W x H)

top_positive.title: Worth the money
top_positive.text:
If you want something simple, up to date, and reliable while also not wanting to do monthly payments this is perfect for that. It can do everything the newer phones can do without all the fancy things if you don't need them or use them. 

Bought two for my kids and they work great.

top_negative.text: This item was not in like new excellent refurbished condition as advertised, so I returned it.  Unfortunately, this is still not showing up as returned in the app and I have not yet received the credit back to my account.  It's my hope that Walmart eventually gets up to par with Amazon in regards to their online platform and returns.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text:
If you want something simple, up to date, and reliable while also not wanting to do monthly payments this is perfect for that. It can do everything the newer phones can do without all the fancy things if you don't need them or use them. 

Bought two for my kids and they work great.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was good, arrived in described time. Had asked a question to Seller about the item but never got a reply. I wouldn't say it was 'like new'. Some scratches on the face were definately visible.  Had it for a few days and appears to work normally. I guess time will tell. Was a little nervous buying from this seller with such a high negative feedback but so far it has turned out good.

customer_reviews.title: Maximum Battery Capacity 74% 🪫...................
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not the iPhone was in great condition minimal scratches and lived up to the description in terms of "like new". The battery on the other hand  had a Maximum Capacity of 74% 🪫. In their description the MINIMUM is suppose to be at a Maximum Capacity of 80%. This bad battery defeats the whole purpose of where no matter how good the phone looks I can't use it all day on a single charge 🚫. I literally have to turn my phone off when I'm not using it or it will drain. Anyhow I decided that I would  swap the battery out myself to fix "their" problem "IF AND ONLY IF"  they would refund me enough money to purchase the new battery and these dudes said no 🤦🏽‍♂️.  With that being said it was obvious at this point I was going to return the phone. These guys should be checking their phones before sending them out and it was quite obvious they didn't check mine before sending it out to me resulting in a waste of time for me only to buy another phone one elsewhere. Long story short, this may be your experience buying a phone with these guys "UNLESS" they decide to start checking their phones prior to sending them out. Good luck!

customer_reviews.title: the one i got wasnt worth it
customer_reviews.text:
wouldn't recommend. i saw a review saying that voice assistant was on didnt think much of it. yeah i had voice assistant on mine as soon as i took it out. Had many deep scratches and home button didnt work much at sll, screen wasnt responsive even had others try it and they had the same issues. Didnt even get fully signed into it before i started the return. 

Hoping the return goes better. but in total it shouldnt be sold as "Like New" when its in B- condition

This item was not in like new excellent refurbished condition as advertised, so I returned it.  Unfortunately, this is still not showing up as returned in the app and I have not yet received the credit back to my account.  It's my hope that Walmart eventually gets up to par with Amazon in regards to their online platform and returns.

customer_reviews.title: Phone doesn't work !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the phone for my 6 yr old. The phone won't even stay on. It will let me get through a couple set up questions and then go black out of nowhere. The return so far hasn't been smooth. I can't even get the imei %23 to connect the phone since it won't stay on and the company is asking for that in order to return it. I knew the price was too good to be true. It's been 10 days with no refund yet.

customer_reviews.title: Reebelo Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase in Reebelo in the future and will be contacting Walmart.com regarding this order.  I have contacted Reebelo several times in order to receive the product I purchased, a refurbished iPhone SE 3 in like new condition, but Reebelo says they only take returns.  The product invoice that I received even says that the product is in "good" condition and is black which are both entirely different than what I ordered.  Reebelo would not even offer an apology, but assured me that my experience would be better if purchasing from them in the future.  They did offer to discount the item by $10 which is a joke since we know that there is about a $70-$100 price difference in the price of good and a like new product.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this, it is a scam! This seller sold me a defective phone that's not refurbished properly %26 is broken. I am being offered a 10% refund for a phone which doesn't work! The microphone on the phone doesn't work %26 the touch screen doesn't work properly. The touch sensitivity doesn't work on certain parts of the screen. It's a piece of garbage!!!

Received my I Phone SE 2nd generation, it is advertised as like new but unit hav many many deep scratches all over and Battery life is under 74% witch  is under scope  and not acceptable, unit was advertised like new but this unit is very poorly cleaned or maintained .
I do not know whom to contact to return and request a full refund.
very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Not up to the specs described by seller
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to come with a battery that as at least 80% battery health. Came with about 70% and company only responded with a return option. How can I know that the next one won't be any worse? I need a phone, but I want what I purchased.
